title: Jedidiah Boone
description: Army scout, Indian fighter, bounty hunter, and great nephew of the legendary frontiersman, Daniel Boone, Jedidiah hung up his guns and retired to his mountain hideaway. But an Apache massacre and the kidnapping of two young girls changed all that. Jedidiah will need all his skills and more as he battles the harsh elements of the vast New Mexico desert, and the warriors of the Apache, in a desperate attempt to rescue the captive girls before it is too late. Read by Gene Engene. 6 CDs 6 Hrs.
author: Dusty Rhodes
